thread.title: Just In: Key Trump Cabinet Member CONFIRMED
thread.title_full: Just In: Key Trump Cabinet Member CONFIRMED

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Just In: Key Trump Cabinet Member CONFIRMED
text:
08:56pm   
It is pretty ridiculous how many important members of Trump’s cabinet haven’t been confirmed yet. 
But, you can thank the Democrats for that. 
They have made it clear they only care about making life difficult for Trump. 
Today, Trump scored a victory on that front. 
He finally got his Treasury Secretary. 
From Washington Examiner : 
President Trump has his economic right-hand man in place. 
The Senate voted Monday evening to confirm Steven Mnuchin, a former investor, banker and Trump campaign official, to be the 77th secretary of the treasury. Sen. Joe Manchin, D-W.Va., was the only Democrat to vote with Republicans, and the nominee was confirmed 53-47. 
Great news. 
Time to start cutting taxes and getting some work done on tax reform. 
That’s something all Americans should be able to get behind. LIKE this article?
